topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54851e8f6368721b0f610100#post_54851e8f6368721b0f610100
Reason why moot is a idiot:
Moot doesn't have a degree or job.
He is the definition of a one hit wonder.
4chan is his source of income.
Even if he manages to sell 4chan he's going to receive considerably less money than he is expecting; he's expecting hundreds of millions of dollars or such from selling it, but in all probability he's only going to get a hundred thousand or such from it which while is still a large amount of money is not enough to live off financially for the rest of your life.
He's going to be homeless on the street.

Tl:dr; moot is a idiot.
